content: Question. @rylev has expressed to me that he'd prefer to have a CTCFT slot that was earlier in the day, since the current slots are either "late" or "very late" in the evening.

I'm curious whether there are others who might like to have, say, a slot like 2021-11-15T12:00:00-05:00 (probably the earliest we can go while still being PST-friendly, which seems worthwhile given the number of people there)
Works for me. Id like to hear from some pst ppl tho, thats as early as id go for pst.
The proposed time on Nov 15th would be great
